General.Name: Apteki 36
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Pharmacy Chain 36.6 operates pharmacies in Russia. Its pharmacies offer health and beauty products. The company serves customers under the 36.6, Romir, and Gorzdrav brands. Public Joint-Stock Company Pharmacy Chain 36.6 was founded in 1991 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
General.Address: St. Vasilisa Kozhina, Building 1, Moscow, Russia, 121096
